original_text: And he said unto him, Thy brother is come; and thy father hath killed the fatted calf, because he hath received him safe and sound.
korean_text: 대답하되 당신의 동생이 돌아왔으매 당신의 아버지가 건강한 그를 다시 맞아들이게 됨으로 인하여 살진 송아지를 잡았나이다 하니

sentences.original_text: and thy father hath killed the fatted calf
because he hath received him safe and sound
